name: Two-Bedroom-Deluxe-Grand-Suite-Living-Room
caption: Living Room
alt:
The two-bedroom Grand Suites feature decor that reflects The Pierre’s iconic heritage and offers stunning views of Central Park. An impressive entry foyer complements the elegant living room that features regal furnishings. A comfortable sofa, coffee table and two exquisitely upholstered arm chairs. An executive desk with chair sits across a wall mounted 40” TV hangs over the vanity fireplace with console and mini bar.  The space includes a four-seater dining table.  The grand suite is complimented by a well-appointed pantry kitchen for private gatherings.
The suites comprise of two bedrooms – the master bedroom features a plush and comfortable king bed, chaise, two night stands with Bose Wave Studio radio featuring Bluetooth connectivity and alarm clock. An executive writing desk and chair is located opposite the bed, a, 40” TV and console is located on the far side of the room. 
The second bedroom comprises of twin beds, one night stands between the two beds and console with a 40” TV. Four fixture Turkish marble clad bathrooms features a pedestal sink, glass enclosed shower, bathtub, plush bathrobes and towels and luxurious Etro amenities.
